price: (57) For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
